title: news.com.au — Australia’s #1 news site
text: Prime Minister Scott Morrison has promised to increase support for farmers battling drought as Water Minister David Littleproud promises no one will be kicked off drought support funding again. “What we do is important, so I am listening carefully to those producers around the country and those communities,” Mr Morrison said during an exclusive Sky News interview on Monday night. “That’s going to keep happening.” Mr Littleproud made the promise after Labor pointed out 600 families had already been kicked off the Farm Household Allowance.
description: Watch the Latest News.com.au Videos including Featured News Videos and Sports Videos and News Highlights. View more News.com.au Videos and Breaking News and Featured Entertainment Videos online at News.com.au
